title: Kaththi
subTitle: A fugitive encounters his doppelganger and plots to steal his identity for a quick escape. However, fate intervenes as he chooses to embrace and fight for his look-alike's mission.

title: Bhooloham
subTitle: Boologam and Arumugam are two famous boxers whose families are arch-rivals. Taking this into consideration, Deepak, a businessman, hatches a plan to use their rivalry to his advantage.

title: Suprabatham
subTitle: Religious leaders along with devotees recite morning prayers, conduct rituals and sing devotional songs in praise of various Hindu deities.

title: Kandhashastikavasam
subTitle: A comprehensive compilation of religious hymns and devotional songs in praise of Lord Murugan written by various artists.

title: Arul Neram
subTitle: Devout priests in various temples conduct sacred rituals and prayers to praise and worship various deities in the Hindu faith.

title: Kaalai Malar
subTitle: The host interviews various prominent personalities from different fields and discusses in detail their works and future plans.

title: Thenkinnam
subTitle: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of old Tamil film songs composed and performed by various talented artists and singers.

title: Mr. Madras
subTitle: When an industrialist struggles to stand up to a local criminal, she hires a desperate young man in need of a job to settle the dispute. However, once the task is completed, she dismisses him from the job.

title: En Samyal Araiyil
subTitle: A culinary expert demonstrates the preparation of various dishes, sharing delectable recipes and invaluable cooking tips with the audience.

title: Nadodi Paattukkaran
subTitle: Sundaram, a musician, and his troupe travel from village to village, performing songs. One day, they thwart robbers and Sundaram falls in love with the village head's daughter.

title: Suvaiyo Suvai
subTitle: Renowned Indian chefs demonstrate their culinary skills by preparing dishes of various cuisines and sharing useful recipes and tips.

title: Gamma Gamma Malai
subTitle: An eminent culinary expert shares various recipes and demonstrates the process of cooking it step by step, along with providing valuable tips.

title: News
subTitle: The host provides the latest information, advancements, and developments regarding various political, economic and social issues.

title: Krishna Cottage
subTitle: A group of youngsters who are neighbours soon become the best of friends as they get to know each other better. While they get into hilarious situations, they also face life one day at a time.

title: Jeyyam
subTitle: Bringing the best in television.

title: Kai Rasi Kudumbam
subTitle: A joint family based in Kanchipuram face several challenges and hurdles every day, but try to overcome them with each other's help and support.

subTitle: bringing the best in television.

subTitle: Bringing the best in television.

subTitle: Five close friends from various backgrounds face various challenges as they work towards their goals, stand up for each other and make the most of their lives.
